jobDescription: Youman, Madeo & Fasano LLP is seeking a Bilingual English/Spanish Immigration Paralegal Manager for our Jackson Heights (Queens) Law Firm. The ideal candidate for this opportunity must have Family/Litigation Immigration experience. Must have 5+ years working as a paralegal for Immigration firm and 3+ years of managerial experience.  The Paralegal Manager will be responsible of their caseload in addition to the overall supervision of the services provided by the paralegals under their supervision. Responsible for the management and administration of the paralegal and support staff. Excellent communication and multi-tasking skills, as well as have the ability to work independently. Proficiency with Microsoft is helpful.  Requirements: Family based immigration petitions, Adjustment of Status, Provisional Waivers, Draft Affidavits COR and Asylum. Must be able to translate legal documents and conversations from Spanish to English.
